channel.title: 4 great movies
channel.description:
1. Harsh times [img]http://www.schott-nyc.com/download/bancorecursos/schott/press/Harsh-Times_poster.gif[/img]
This story is about an ex-ranger and his friend's struggle to find a job. The ex-ranger is one crazy mofo who's really amusing to watch when he's angry.
2. Running scared [img]http://img.hotmoviesale.com/dvds/TRN-DN10305D/1/Running-Scared.jpg[/img]
Another great movie but I cbf writing anything about it.
3. Pride and Glory [img]http://www.impawards.com/2008/posters/pride_and_glory_ver2.jpg[/img]
A cop movie and a really good one too.
4. Street kings [img]http://www.arm-film.com/film_pictures/Street%20Kings.jpg[/img]
Another great cop movie featuring Neo from the matrix and Hugh Laurie.
4 Great movies that are worth your time. If you've seen them, let me know what you think of them.
[s]I'm in the process of editing this thread to include other movies which I love and think you all must see.[/s]

item.title: 4 great movies
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Hyjall, post:8, topic:362233”][quote author=Radeon link=topic=458518.msg3360449#msg3360449 date=1286314232]

Just watched it and I found it to be shit. Felt like scary movie, epic movie and all these other movies with the word ‘movie’ in their tittle.

You’re trying to watch it like an actionfilm, not a cult movie

See http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVHWJ9jPYw8
[/quote]

Cult movies isn’t a genre, it’s a film that gets acclaim because it doesn’t take itself too seriously (either intended or not) and is a wink or a mockery to their related genre films. Kind of a so bad its good scenario.[/quote]Uh, no. It’s just a movie that has a very specific and devoted fanbase, the actual content of the movie is pretty much irrelevant.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Radeon, post:7, topic:362233”][quote author=Hyjall link=topic=458518.msg3358299#msg3358299 date=1286118246]

Just watched it and I found it to be shit. Felt like scary movie, epic movie and all these other movies with the word ‘movie’ in their tittle.

You’re trying to watch it like an actionfilm, not a cult movie
[/quote]

See http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVHWJ9jPYw8[/quote]

Cult movies isn’t a genre, it’s a film that gets acclaim because it doesn’t take itself too seriously (either intended or not) and is a wink or a mockery to their related genre films. Kind of a so bad its good scenario.

item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

  1. Harsh times
    Harsh-Times_poster.gif397×567

This story is about an ex-ranger and his friend’s struggle to find a job. The ex-ranger is one crazy mofo who’s really amusing to watch when he’s angry.

  1. Running scared

Another great movie but I cbf writing anything about it.

  1. Pride and Glory
    pride_and_glory_ver2.jpg472×755

A cop movie and a really good one too.

  1. Street kings

Another great cop movie featuring Neo from the matrix and Hugh Laurie.

4 Great movies that are worth your time. If you’ve seen them, let me know what you think of them.

I’m in the process of editing this thread to include other movies which I love and think you all must see.
